Honestly I wish Japan's bullshit censorship laws would get fixed cause then anime could do their ecchi stuff without having to worry about tripping on the censorship laws.  Their censorship laws are like having two bars that you have jump over but they're spaced far enough away from each other that it's impossible to jump over; if you try to jump over it you're just going to bash your fucking face into the second bar anyhow.  Showing nipples is perfectly fine but god forbid vagina or penises are shown even in porn.
